prompts: Create a mythical flying Pokemon with green limbs and a purple tornado surrounding it.
Imagine a legendary Pokemon that embodies the spirit of storms with vibrant green and purple colors.
Design a unique Pokemon that has a swirling cloud body and striking green features.
Make a creature that represents the power of wind with bold colors and an aerodynamic shape.
Show me a Pokemon with a fierce appearance, green accents, and a mysterious aura of thunder.
Generate a powerful flying-type Pokemon characterized by its dynamic pose and swirling cloud effects.
I want to see a Pokemon with a striking green and purple color scheme that commands the skies.
